attributes.action: Dismantle the Justice System, carve out the theft, deceit, collusion, bullying, abuse, abuses of power, Abuse of Office, abuse of the rule of law by the Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Their is a great need Sir' that you dismantle, Our famous legal system, and put it back to the way it should be.
Back to it's purpose, were it served as a tool of support for the general people, whether you be a criminal or a law abiding citizen.

I am very aware of what you would find Dear Mr Brown, if you looked!, I can't provide a link to an example of what is actually out their!

Go to youtube and type in the search, 
Justice or Just Us

Please also type in the search colinberry1 and myselfrevealed
Even this information is only the tip of the Ice-berge,......
I am afraid the lying deceitful disease, is so much bigger!!!!!!!
